Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Federation forces presently face far too many threats.

Kill {@LinkCreature:55#4#feystalker sabertooths}, {@LinkCreature:55#3#Bloodgulper orcans}, and {@LinkCreature:55#2#unstable mycanars} to reduce the danger.

Report to Laena at Ceravin Point when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
